content: the smallest size shown fits 6-9 months for the medium size 9-12 months the pattern calls for 400-500 yards dk weight yarn and us 7 needles for the large size 12-15 months the pattern calls for 400-500 yards worsted weight yarn and us 9 needles don t be dismayed by the number of row in this pattern it s actually very intuitive and now thanks to the spectacular efforts of lily ryan we have a chart pattern available here 1 traduction française disponible sur orchid & tricot 2 pdf file 3 1 https //beacon by/nikki-van-de-car/autumnleaves 2 http //orchidettricot blog free fr/index php category/traductions 3 http //orchidettricot blog free fr/public/autumn_leaves_vf pdf
